description: The initiative, Raizal Youth Organization, was founded in 2014 to advocate for the rights of young people and the Raizal community in response to historical injustices. It focuses on leadership development, cultural preservation, and higher education support through scholarships for Raizal and Afro-Colombian youth. The organization also promotes agricultural entrepreneurship, including a food processing plant, to enhance local economic sustainability and empower community members, fostering resilience and cultural identity.
name: Raizal Youth Organization
